Our free-to-use portfolio tracker helps you keep track of your investments across different platforms.  Enter your stock or crypto investments into our app and keep track of how your shares are performing all in one place.

Have you ever struggled to read complicated stock market charts and graphs? Our Buy/ Sell indicator will show when it is time to buy or sell a stock. [This is currently in development]

Keeping up to date with the latest news from the stock market and cryptos can be time consuming. That’s why we’ve devised a central feed so you can easily keep up with your favorite companies.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#4328B7″ divider_weight=”4px” _builder_version=”3.3.1″ max_width=”80px” height=”4px” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.8.2″ text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”2em” header_font=”||||||||” background_layout=”dark” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

Our platform is completely free to use for everyone. All of our features with the app can be accessed with a basic free account. In addition to the portfolio tracker, you can access our Buy/Sell indicator, social forums and receive up to date information on your favorite companies with our live investing tips.

excerpt.rendered: Our free-to-use portfolio tracker helps you keep track of your investments across different platforms.  Enter your stock or crypto investments into our app and keep track of how your shares are performing all in one place.Have you ever struggled to read complicated stock market charts and graphs?
